14.title: Between Friends

notes: Summary: Simon was stifled by his parents' rules and regulations and had to move out for some freedom, then got stifled by child-support payments and had to move back in. Call no.: PN6726f.B55 "Parents"

15.title: Between Friends

notes: Summary: After they've said goodbye, Simon comes back and gives Maeve a surprise kiss.
Key words: Divorced.

16.title: Between Friends

17.title: Between Friends
17.author: Bell-Lundy.
17.series: Sept. 1, 1997) "A Certain Ambience, a Particular Sound"*
notes: Summary: She tries to pinpoint what it is about long weekends, and he knows: lawnmowers.

18.title: Between Friends
18.author: Bell-Lundy.
18.series: Nov. 27, 1997) "It Must Be Nice to Have a Nine-to-Five Job"*
notes: Summary: Elaine's still in the nursing profession, but tired of the shift work and emergency overtime.

19.title: Between Friends
19.author: Bell-Lundy.
19.series: Mar. 28, 1998) "Too Sophisticated to be Frightened by a Scary Face Anymore"*
notes: Summary: Science fiction has gotten more intellectual, she says, watching television with a mud pack on her face; he, unshaven and bleary-eyed, agrees. Examples used are Millennium and The X-Files.

20.title: Between Friends
20.author: Bell-Lundy.
20.series: June 20, 1998) "There's No Telling How Much I Can Accomplish in Seven Hours of Peace and Quiet"*
notes: Summary: Mom's lonely in her home office already, with Danny finally off in daycare.

21.title: Between Friends
21.author: Bell-Lundy.
notes: Summary: The death of a dandelion in a fog of spray interrupts the perusal of a issue of Organic Gardening.

22.title: Between Friends

notes: Summary: The young entrepreneur at the door charges extra to weed-whack the edges.
